title: Honoring enemies
body: So I know a lot of people have already brought up honoring enemies, but I just read the most recent Ask Riot (ik i'm late reading) and it gave me an idea. As a way of making it possible, you could keep the current form, but add an option to honor an enemy in the post game lobby. If a rioter reads this and this was already tried, can you let me know why it failed?
